title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic data engineering with AWS Analytics MCP Servers (ANT335)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Analytics MCP 服务器进行智能体数据工程 (ANT335)
abstract: In this session, we will introduce AWS Analytics Model Context Protocol (MCP) Servers, including the Data Processing MCP Server and Amazon Redshift MCP Server, which enable agentic workflows across AWS Glue, Amazon EMR, Amazon Athena, and Amazon Redshift. You will learn how these open-source tools simplify complex analytics operations through natural language interactions with AI agents. We'll cover MCP server implementation strategies, real-world use cases, architectural patterns for deployment, and production best practices for building intelligent data engineering workflows that understand and orchestrate your analytics environment.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，我们将介绍AWS分析模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器，包括数据处理MCP服务器和Amazon Redshift MCP服务器，这些服务器支持跨AWS Glue、Amazon EMR、Amazon Athena和Amazon Redshift的代理工作流。您将了解这些开源工具如何通过与AI代理的自然语言交互来简化复杂的分析操作。我们将涵盖MCP服务器实施策略、实际用例、部署架构模式，以及构建能够理解和编排您的分析环境的智能数据工程工作流的生产最佳实践。
